If you are a fan of Zorro, Indiana Jones, or action in general this is a must-see. Directed by Republic's ace team of William Witney and John English and starring John ‘Daredevil’ Carroll, the movie Fowler rides into Mexico at the height of the revolution where he meets up with former friends dishonorably discharged from the army as well as old enemies. Yet he still manages to right a few wrongs.
Hornady 6mm

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The peculiarity starts when the sky turns red during the full moon. A short story by Stephen King, released as an adaptation to this movie.
Production companies : New Regency Pictures , Rastar Films
